definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
a powerful current/a flood (often fig., e.g. a flood of ideas)
Yuhong District of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市[Shen3 yang2 shi4], Liaoning
Hongwu Emperor, also written Hung-wu Ti, reign name of first Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1] (1328-1398), reigned 1386-1398, Temple name 明太祖[Ming2 Tai4 zu3]
Hongshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei
Honghu county level city in Jingzhou 荊州|荆州[Jing1 zhou1], Hubei

sentences.english: The embankment must be reinforced before the flood season.
sentences.chinese: 坝基一定要在洪汛期到来之前加固好。

sentences.english: Ep560 - Old Madam Hong tries to persuade Zhizhong stop his evil deeds, but Zhizhong ignores her.
sentences.chinese: 洪老太苦口婆心劝志忠勿再做坏事，但志忠不加理会。

sentences.english: Ms. Hong ask me to say 'Hello' to you.
sentences.chinese: 洪女士让我转达她对你的问候。

sentences.english: Alex Ang joined Jin Jiang Hotels in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 洪江海先生于2007年加入锦江集团。

sentences.english: Miss Liu, This is my friend, Yu Hong. She wants to recognize you very soon.
sentences.chinese: 刘老师，这是我朋友于洪，她想认识你已经很久了。

sentences.english: I am Mark Huang, a second-year senior high school student. I am seventeen years old.
sentences.chinese: 我是高中二年级的洪马克，年龄十七岁。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Old Madam Hong gives Zhizhong a piece of land.
sentences.chinese: 其间，洪老太送给志忠一块地，作为增资之用。

sentences.english: Before the arrival of the flood season, everybody was ready to fight floods and reduce damage.
sentences.chinese: 在洪汛期到来之前，大家早已做好了抗涝减灾准备。

sentences.english: The Party Representative of the Detachment, Hong Changqing educates the soldiers and the people with the bitter experience of Qionghua's family.
sentences.chinese: 娘子军党代表洪常青以琼花的世代怨仇教育广大军民。

sentences.english: Old Madam Hong suggests that Zhizhong get a loan from Shijie Hotel, but is stopped by Mingming.
sentences.chinese: 洪老太建议志忠向世界饭店贷款，却遭明明阻止。

sentences.english: Ms. Hong asked me to say'hello'to you.
sentences.chinese: 洪女士让我转达她对你的问候。

sentences.english: Mr Hong, this is the cooperative proposal. Please have a look.
sentences.chinese: 洪先生，这是合作企画案，请你先过目。

sentences.english: Professor Wang Changhong achieved a great deal of experience in the treatment of UC.
sentences.chinese: 导师王长洪教授诊治UC具有丰富的临床经验。

sentences.english: Yuhong airport is for military use only.
sentences.chinese: 于洪机场只为军事用途。

sentences.english: After Hong's sacrifice, Qionghua inherited his behest and kept on moving to victory.
sentences.chinese: 洪常青牺牲后，她接过红旗英勇向前。

definition: pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
